sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; import { ViewportScroller } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ title = 'Convergence'; navbarfixed:boolean = false; constructor(private viewPortScroller: ViewportScroller) {} ngOnInit(): void {} @HostListener('window:scroll',['$event']) onScroll() { if(window.scrollY > 100) { this.navbarfixed = true; } else { this.navbarfixed = false; } } public onClick(elementId: string): void{ this.viewPortScroller.scrollToAnchor(elementId); } }
